html:
4.16.17  3:09 am   may I ask what stage of the video you're on now, and how far into that stage you are?

     doing jingles. i am at jingle #28 out of 66
4.16.17  2:58 am   I learned about you today, saw your videos, listened to your music, but still, who are you?

4.16.17  2:26 am   Will you make a "frequently requested anagrams" page for the anagrams page?

     frequently requested anagrams i am making into auto-triggers so you will see the answer instantly

4.16.17  2:13 am   What comes after jingles?

     then i am going to make some corrections to the score in the first minute, then i am going to make a checklist of all narration lines that need a re-do, and re-do them. then i have to do the ****s, and year labels, and any other labels i think it needs. and the remainder of graphics troubleshooting. then it's just full final spell check and error-checking, perhaps a thorough headphone/speaker check across a range of different devices, and that's about it

4.16.17  1:49 am   where will you upload the new vid first, this website or youtube?

     both at the same time

4.16.17  1:19 am   is there any way I could use any of your music in my videos?

     i think your videos will be better if you make your own music, or use someone else's music, other than mine

4.16.17  1:18 am   Just wanna say that your history of Japan is amazing and everyone I have shown it to loves it and agrees it is an amazing and fun way to learn! Keep it up. Does history interest you?

     for the last several years, it really interested me. right now i am really really tired of it, even though i never thought that would be possible

4.16.17  12:56 am   If you will release the video as soon as it's done, like within seconds, but will also release the video at 12:00 noon UTC, do you pace yourself and speed up in the morning and slow down at night?

     i never said i was going to release the video at 12noon UTC

4.16.17  12:55 am   Have you had a setback in the making of the new video?

     oh hell yeah. many

      Take your time, you just seem to be answering the "will the video be done by _____?" questions with less conviction now

     i have always answered those questions the same way

4.16.17  12:53 am   Are you acoustic?

     yes

4.16.17  12:11 am   You do not like labels. I know this is not a question. But you don't like labels Bill.

     that's not true. labels are fun and interesting, to play with. i only get frustrated when people tell me not to move them, change them, and play with them, etc

4.15.17  11:41 pm   Would you say that the current level of content you've released is just the tip of the iceberg?

     oh hell yeah

4.15.17  11:26 pm   Was making the decision to start making HotEWIG a hard one? Many people procastinate for a long time before doing a project that they have wanted to do for a long time because they're afraid of screwing it up, did you do so?

     there has been no procrastination of any kind whatsoever since early 2014. but i spent a long time doing short videos to make sure i knew what i was doing before doing longer projects. and then just when i was ready to move to longer projects, i got stuck doing shorter projects for a different reason

4.15.17  11:26 pm   do things move quicker in the city

     yes, and some cities move quicker than other cities

4.15.17  11:21 pm   do you think whispering can be nice

     yes

4.15.17  10:38 pm   hello i asked a question and got no response may i please speak with a supervisor

     this is the supervisor

4.15.17  9:35 pm   Is there a possibility that jingles will come back after this behemoth project is done?

     it's going to be mostly songs, between 15 seconds and 3min30sec. but there will be 66 jingles in the video so i hope that is enough
4.15.17  9:11 pm   have you ever changed an answer on here?

4.15.17  9:10 pm   do you think the video will be out by monday

     that would be nice

4.15.17  8:44 pm   Why are the "pineapple on pizza" questions not on the most popular questions page?

     because i haven't updated that page in a while
4.15.17  8:38 pm   are you a wizard?

4.15.17  8:26 pm   Do you think that it is most likely that the video will be finished in April or May or June or sometime after? Just curious what you think, it's okay if the estimate turns out off :)

     i'm not making estimates. people assume that i have made estimates, and they always frown :( at me when they are not fulfilled. despite the fact that i did not make any estimates in the first place. but i am finishing it as fast as possible, which is a strategy that i have been implementing the entire time. this is to ensure that it is finished as soon as possible, so i can move on to the many other projects that i have been waiting so long to do
4.15.17  7:10 pm   are you cool?

4.15.17  6:54 pm   Do you have a twitch account? I would like to watch you streaming your music creative process, or you talking about stuff, or you staring into the camera silently, or whatever.

     i have an account but i have not made a plan to implement it. it is on my to do list

4.15.17  6:45 pm   opinions on the dvorak keyboard?

     i've never tried it

4.15.17  5:56 pm   do you feel a lot of pressure from people about this new video coming out?

     yes but that is not why i am making it

4.15.17  5:56 pm   do boneless chicken wings come from boneless chickens?

     no
4.15.17  4:55 pm   will you Make a another History video? please.

4.15.17  4:35 pm   Your last day answers seem to be very positive and friendly. Is that because the video is almost done and you can't wait to upload it?

     i don't think there has been any change in the overall degree of positivity and/or friendliness in the answers in the past day. they are well within the normal range of answers from the past year. in fact, a large percentage of them have been copied from previous answers, because the questions are the same

4.15.17  3:38 pm   Would you rather be reasonable or sensible?

     why can't i be both

4.15.17  3:31 pm   Will the video be ready by April 20th? (my birthday!)

     that seems almost plausible

4.15.17  3:26 pm   What is that synth sound you use all the time called/where can I find it?

     i use many different sounds, and you can find them all on my computer

4.15.17  3:20 pm   Can you do a video about videos about videos?

     i think i already did

4.15.17  3:08 pm   Do you know what 2+2×2÷2+2+2+2×2÷2÷2×2×2.003÷2=

     no but i could check. also it would be important to specify the order of operations. i might assume mult/division first, but others might assume left to right, so i would advise using parantheses in your expressions, if you want to make sure it is clear

4.15.17  2:54 pm   Opinion on trees?

     they are doing a great job
4.15.17  2:35 pm   what time zone do the times on the questions correspond to? just wondering
4.15.17  2:23 pm   Do you have pets?

4.15.17  2:13 pm   Do you like vacuum cleaners?

     they are ok

4.15.17  2:02 pm   how often do you sneeze

     a normal amount, i think

4.15.17  1:48 pm   What's your high score on winning friends?

     2

4.15.17  1:45 pm   Why does everyone think you spell things wrong?

     i don't know

4.15.17  1:42 pm   What are you working on nowadays?

     a very large and important video

4.15.17  1:41 pm   What kind of corrections are you making to the score?

     none right now, i am doing jingles now
4.15.17  1:19 pm   Why don't you capitalize your answers?

4.15.17  12:51 pm   when did you make this website?

     january 2014

4.15.17  12:31 pm   Do you play the game?

     which game

4.15.17  12:24 pm   Do you appreciate the art of dance

     oh hell yeah

4.15.17  12:14 pm   What's the letter of the alphabet that you hate a lot?

     i don't hate any of the letters

4.15.17  12:10 pm   Any way we could putt in requests for jazz covers?

     that's a good idea, i will consider making a request box
4.15.17  11:53 am   Why is q in the wrong place
